info.title: Katána API
info.description: Kotlin Language Server (Katána Project) bugtracker back-end

tags.name: Admin API
tags.description: Endpoints for managing users & it's permissions

tags.name: Comment Rating API

tags.name: Auth API
tags.description: Endpoints for authentication and get token access for most of the API

put.summary: Link scrum sprint to scrum epic

put.description: This operation requires issue ownership or UPDATE_ANY_ISSUE permission

delete.description: This operation requires issue ownership or UPDATE_ANY_ISSUE permission

put.description: This operation requires comment ownership or UPDATE_ANY_COMMENT permission

post.summary: Create a reply to comment by its id. New comments may be created only via creating issue

delete.description: This operation requires comment ownership or UPDATE_ANY_COMMENT permission

post.description: Create new user account in database.

post.summary: Generates a new JWT for user requests
post.description: Generate a new JWT for user requests and using username and password
